ul.li: Skill Proficiencies:Insight, and pick 1: stealth, investigation, security, deception, performance, persuasion

setters.set: Insight, and pick 1: stealth, investigation, intimidation, deception, performance, persuasion, Two languages of your choice

description.p: As a spy, you have access to a secret network of supporters and operatives who can provide assistance on your adventures. You know a set of secret signs and passwords you can use to identify such operatives, who can provide you with access to a hidden safe house, free room and board, or assistance in finding information. These agents never risk their lives for you or risk revealing their true identities.
